title: DIN alternate
content:
Hello masters,

I’m designing a little brochure in 2 colors : black and yellow.  
the layout is really grid based, and FF DIN has been obvious since day 1.

I really like the german look of DIN, but I feel it is a bit overused these days.  
I would love to use a font slightly different. The same, but different (like coke/ pepsi).

For a moment, I thought about modifying DIN, but I’m not skilled enough to touch such a beauty.

I was wondering if one of you type experts could suggest a substitute for DIN.

thanks in advance for anyhelp you could give.

And thanks anyway for the amazing quality of the content of this website.

Cheers,

J.
